highlights.description: Non-polymorphic JSON IR for Apache ECharts enabling reliable AI-assisted chart generation
TypeScript-first architecture with Zod schemas as source of truth
Dual-language support: TypeScript/JavaScript and Go implementations

added.description: ChartIR types for non-polymorphic ECharts configuration (Dataset, Mark, Axis, Legend, Tooltip, Grid)
TypeScript implementation with Zod schemas for validation
IR-to-ECharts compiler supporting line, bar, pie, scatter, and area charts
Go types matching the TypeScript schema definitions
JSON Schema generation from Zod schemas
Embedded JSON Schema in Go via `//go:embed`
Example chart definitions: line, bar, pie, multi-series
Interactive browser demo with live chart rendering

fixed.description: Use local EChartsOption type to avoid echarts import issues in CI
Add ESLint configuration for TypeScript CI

documentation.description: Product Requirements Document (PRD.md) with problem statement and design goals
Technical Requirements Document (TRD.md) with architecture overview
README with Quick Start, IR Schema Reference, and API documentation
Example usage for AI assistant integration

build.description: Go CI workflow with multi-platform matrix (Go 1.26.x/1.25.x, Linux/macOS/Windows)
TypeScript Lint workflow with ESLint 9.x flat config

tests.description: 53 TypeScript tests covering schemas, compiler, and examples
10 Go tests for chartir types and schema embedding
